name: Present Day
description:
(Browser version is preferred, I forgot to build the new version for desktop)

Present day is a 3D physics based factory building game that was created during the Extra credits holiday Gamejam 2018.

Your final goal is to set up a production line of presents that will go in the marked launcher, but there is a problem, your machines sometimes break down leaving only smoke and an unusable position behind. This will clear up after some time, but you will have to find a quick fix to this, if you dont want to lose your hard earned money.

Controls:

Place machine on grid: Left mouse button
Point at machine + X: Delete machine
Point at machine + R: Rotate machine
Move camera around: WASD, Arrow keys and Mouse wheel
Q,E: Switch between machines to place
Tab: Go through the different recipes on the purple combiner, the current recipe is shown in the preview in the bottom right
Escape: Back to the main menu

A list of all recipes can be found to the right of the main platform
1:1 Recipes can be used using the Refinery (red cube, purple is the output direction)
2:1 Recipes: Combiner (purple cube, arrows indicate inputs and outputs)
